title: Filbert and the melon cheater: subtraction with borrowing
creator_credit: Davidson Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Introduces two digit subtraction problems, including those which require regrouping, through an animated story about the problems of an honest melon merchant. Filbert devises an accounting system called “dump a box” based on subtraction with borrowing to try to stop a melon thief. Suitable for upper primary level.
